definitions: a person who adheres excessively to prescribed forms

examples.text: to the strict formalist, the law is the law

shortDefinitions: person who adheres excessively to prescribed forms

definitions: a follower or advocate of the basing of ethics on the form of the moral law without regard to intention or consequences.
shortDefinitions: follower or advocate of basing of ethics on form of moral law without regard to intention or consequences

definitions: an artist who is excessively concerned with form, technique, or symbolism rather than content

examples.text: a conventional formalist who would reduce painting to its essential qualities

shortDefinitions: artist who is excessively concerned with form and technique rather than content

definitions: an advocate of the treatment of mathematics as a manipulation of meaningless symbols.
shortDefinitions: advocate of treatment of mathematics as manipulation of meaningless symbols

definitions: relating to or supporting principles of formalism

examples.text: his is a formalist approach, describing the art in terms of composition and content

shortDefinitions: relating to or supporting absolute principles
